title: NEW CHAMPION IDEAS
body:
So I went away for a couple of days and came up with a couple rough new champion ideas that anyone can help finish.

The first idea is a yordle that is a cook/chef
His/her q could be a damage ability where he/she could throw a pot pan or kettle to do damage
His/her w can be a shield whether spell or damage shield where they get protected by pots and pans
His/her e could consist of him/her throwing dough in an aoe to catch people and root them to the ground, pretty much sticky dough
His/her ult finally should be like anti teemo where he/she places a cake that people can walk over and heal themselves
I haven't come up with a passive but it could tie into the fact that he/she is a cook

The second champion idea I came up with is a new adc that is like udyr where he gets the temporary buff and his abilities are all elements so he is just auto attacks and no spells
His q is fire giving him extra damage for 1 second
His w is water where he gets life steal but only a tiny bit otherwise it will be op and for only a little bit like 1 second also
His e could be earth where his auto attacks slow slightly for like 2 autos
His r is no ult like udyr but could instead change his autos to a wind like state and give him attack speed
His passive could be like syndras where his abilities upgrade when he fully levels them, fire could get try damage, water a shield or extra life steal, earth could stun after a number of autos and air could give movement speed after a few autos

The final champion idea is a caster mid laner that is a cloud
His q can be an electrical bolt that is mainly used for damage and is like ryzes q just a point and click
His w can be an ability where he disperses and becomes un targetable doing damage overtime to enemies in his area and slowing slightly
His e can be a gap closer or escape like corkis but instead of leaving a trail of damage it does damage immediately as he flies over and leaves no trail
His ult is like a mini janna or gragas ult knocking everyone away before turning into a hurricane sucking everyone in or giving a slow to anyone trying to travel away from him as he does damage overtime
His passive I haven't thought of yet but it could be something where he has no mana but instead a bar that charges when he casts his q and when fully charged he changes to a storm cloud doing extra damage and his abilities can gain extra cc like a .5 second stun

All these ideas are just suggestions and anyone can add on any kind of ideas they had or suggest changes towards the champions. I would like to hear any feed back toward these champion ideas.
